title.rendered: Alticor Inc Board of Directors Announce Promotion of Darren Leary

content.rendered: The Board of Directors announced the promotion of Darren Leary to General Superintendent.  Darren joined Alticor Inc in 2001 and served as a project engineer at the San Jose Marriot and UCSF Mission Bay projects before being promoted to area superintendent on the Alameda County Justice project.  Since that time, he has lead numerous projects as superintendent.  He has proven himself as a leader in the Alticor Inc organization and is deserving of being the newest General Superintendent.

excerpt.rendered: The Board of Directors announces the promotion of Darren Leary to General Superintendent.
